anya-e1010n:12: Cakkavāḷa nahutā ga, devāli gaṇa cumbito;
anya-e1010n:13: Buddha pādambujo ṭhātu, sīse dayā tigandhajo.
anya-e1010n:15: Nanta cakkavāḷa bbhugga, guṇa sanniccitaṃ jinaṃ;
anya-e1010n:16: Vande tappūjitaṃ dhammaṃ, tajjaṃ saṅghañca nimmalaṃ.
anya-e1010n:35: Asubhāya hane rāgaṃ, dosaṃ mettāya paññavā.
anya-e1010n:42: Hata cakkārato pūjā, rahattā cārahaṃ name.
anya-e1010n:45: Adāsi paramaṃ tuṭṭhiṃ, saccāni dassayaṃ divā.
anya-e1010n:50: Ādo phalasukhaṃ vedi, majjhe seyya makā jino;
anya-e1010n:51: Veneyyo lokanaṃ ante, pacchimepi tidhā kate.
anya-e1010n:53: Khedaṃ agaṇayaṃ nātho, pañca buddhakataṃ vahaṃ;
anya-e1010n:71: Iti uyyojanaṃ mhākaṃ, muttassa muttiyā saraṃ;
anya-e1010n:81: Minetuṃ neva sakkoti, evaṃ kenaci tagguṇaṃ.
anya-e1010n:90: Na hi so pakkamo atthi, yena jātā namiyyare;
anya-e1010n:91: Jarampi patvā maraṇaṃ, evaṃdhammā hi pāṇino.
anya-e1010n:93: Phalāna miva pakkānaṃ, pāto patanato bhayaṃ;
anya-e1010n:94: Evaṃ jātāna maccānaṃ, niccaṃ maraṇa to bhayaṃ.
anya-e1010n:109: Tasmā dhīrā nasocanti, viditvā loka pariyāyaṃ.
anya-e1010n:111: Aññepi passa gamane, yathā kammupage nare;
anya-e1010n:132: Na tattha hatthi naṃ bhummi, na rathānaṃ napattiyā;
anya-e1010n:133: Na cāpi mantayuddhena, sakkā jetuṃ dhanenavā.
anya-e1010n:140: Yo dhammacārī kāyena, vācāya uda cetasā;
anya-e1010n:144: Yathā vārivaho pūro, vahe rukkhe pakūlaje;
anya-e1010n:152: Sāya meke nidissanti, pāto diṭṭhā bahujjanā;
anya-e1010n:153: Pāto eke nadissanti, sāyaṃ diṭṭhā bahujjanā.
anya-e1010n:155: Ajjeva kiccaṃ ātappaṃ, ko jaññā maraṇaṃ suve;
anya-e1010n:156: Nahi no saṅkaraṃ tena, mahāsenana maccunāti.
anya-e1010n:180: Mayā samā navā vuddhā, tadāvudhehi te matā;
anya-e1010n:181: Tathā hampi marissāmi, leṇaṃ puññaṃva me kataṃ.
anya-e1010n:194: Uppajjeyyuṃ rujā svepi, asāto dukkhamā kharā;
anya-e1010n:213: Evaṃ cintayanto santo, napāpaṃ kattu mussahe.
anya-e1010n:219: Kare kātabba kammañca, evaṃ so nānusocati.
anya-e1010n:222: Pattepi maraṇe kāle, na sammuḷho nasokavā.
anya-e1010n:224: Maraṇā sannasaññī so, sodheti attano malaṃ;
anya-e1010n:225: Nimmalena cuto bhikkhu, natvevā pāya gāmiko.
anya-e1010n:235: Sati āsanna maraṇe, duṭṭho dosoti thaddhavā;
anya-e1010n:242: Saṃsaṭṭho na nulomehi, svativassu mukho tadā.
anya-e1010n:247: Sasokī sahanandīca, dukkhe dukkho sukhe sukho;
anya-e1010n:251: Kimikhajjavaṇo sāva, bhanto kiṃ sugatiṃ vaje.
anya-e1010n:254: Ganthaṃ vipassanaṃ tandī, kāruññoyeva so cuto.
anya-e1010n:260: Puññe cintāpi nuppajji, nirayaṃ so manaṃ gato.
anya-e1010n:263: Citaṃ citaṃ ihevetaṃ, tasmiṃgiddho sa pettiko.
anya-e1010n:275: Kāle uposathāvāso, so niccaṃ sugatiṃ vajje.
anya-e1010n:280: Atikkantā bahū ratyo, khepetvā mama jīvitaṃ;
anya-e1010n:295: Addhā pahāya gāmīnaṃ, kiṃ pamāda vihārinā.
anya-e1010n:306: Saddhā bandhatu pātheyyaṃ, tadesanaṃ iheva hi;
anya-e1010n:326: Na hāsi nevanandīca, na cāpallo kadācipi.
anya-e1010n:341: Puññaṃ sarati ce satto, tadeva sugatiṃ vaje.
anya-e1010n:343: Pāpa kaḍḍhampi niraye, manaṃ dukkhagataṃ pajaṃ;
anya-e1010n:344: Dukkhā moceti yaṃpuññaṃ, sadā kātabbameva taṃ.
anya-e1010n:347: Taṃ padīpandhakāraṃva, dvayaṃ otvā khukaṃ viya.
anya-e1010n:365: Pamādassanti cikkhanto, tattaṃ guḷaṃ turaṃ gili.
anya-e1010n:368: Devadūte ime pañca, disvā saṃviggataṃ vaje.
anya-e1010n:371: Te dīgharattaṃ socanti, hina kāyū pagānarā.
anya-e1010n:384: Sīdanteva jale khittā, silā mahāva khuddakā;
anya-e1010n:391: Dukkhāti dukkha saṃkiṇṇo, haṭṭhuṃ tuṭṭhuṃ nasakkuṇe.
anya-e1010n:407: Miḷha semhādi saṃkiṇṇe, ati duggandha vāsite;
anya-e1010n:428: Puññaṃ punappunaṃ deti, sandhiṃ na nibbutiṃ varaṃ.
anya-e1010n:431: Puññaṃ bhava matikkamma, nibbānaṃ deti nibbutiṃ.
anya-e1010n:437: Nibbinda yutta cittena, vajjeyya bhavasāta to.
anya-e1010n:440: Bhava sāta vasā tasmā, dhīro taṃ lagganaṃ caje.
anya-e1010n:444: Dassetvā matasārīraṃ, tassā jino idaṃ bravi.
anya-e1010n:446: Caraṃvā yadivā tiṭṭhaṃ, nisinno udavā sayaṃ;
anya-e1010n:449: Aṭṭhi nhārūhi saṃyutto, taca maṃsāva lepano;
anya-e1010n:458: Athassa navahi sotehi, asuci savati sabbadā;
anya-e1010n:475: Kākā gijjhāca khādanti, yecaññe santi pāṇakā.
anya-e1010n:483: Chanda rāga viratto so, bhikkhu paññāṇavā idha;
anya-e1010n:484: Ajjhagā amataṃ santiṃ, nibbānaṃ pada maccutaṃ.
anya-e1010n:497: Kimikhajjavaṇo sāva, dukkhī rāgī sa sabbadā.
anya-e1010n:507: Ekassa pivitaṃ khīraṃ, catū dadhi jalā bahu;
anya-e1010n:513: Ekassa rudato assu, catū dadhi jalā bahu;
anya-e1010n:516: Tattāyo guḷa gilita, vadhaggi dayhanā dikaṃ;
anya-e1010n:519: Eka dvitti catu pañca, buddhuppādepya mocitaṃ;
anya-e1010n:528: Eka kappe idaṃ dukkhaṃ, nādikappesu kākathā;
anya-e1010n:529: Rāgo nanu mahāverī, bālo jano ta micchati.
anya-e1010n:532: Nibbānaṃ pañca paccakkhā, asubhāya phalā matā.
anya-e1010n:546: Puḷuva ṭṭhika miccesu, laddhā aññataraṃ sato;
anya-e1010n:549: Mataṃ khajjaṃ sa maṃsañca, nilohitaṃ nimaṃsakaṃ;
anya-e1010n:561: Yathā idaṃ tathāetaṃ, yathāetaṃ tathā idaṃ;
anya-e1010n:586: Saṅkhatampi yathā vaccaṃ, manuññataṃ na pāpuṇe;
anya-e1010n:606: Santaṃ cinteyya nāsantaṃ, santa cintayato sukhaṃ;
anya-e1010n:613: Tāya santañca bhūtañca, na passati kadācipi.
anya-e1010n:616: Rudato assu taṃhetu, catūdadhi jalā bahu.
anya-e1010n:619: Rāgaṃ hantu manīhoce, khīraṃ assuca lohitaṃ.
anya-e1010n:633: Dāni mandaggi hutvāna, pāmojjaṃ ve labhissati.
anya-e1010n:636: Aladdhā kiñci pāmojjaṃ, pabbajjampi na modati.
anya-e1010n:638: Pure marāmi kāye smiṃ, passā mi passitabbakaṃ;
anya-e1010n:641: Kāye daṭṭhabba jegucchaṃ, apassanto pamāda vā;
anya-e1010n:647: Santaṃ bhūtañca kāye smiṃ, daṭṭhukāmo sadāsato;
anya-e1010n:651: Ajja svevā vinaṭṭhena, nāla munnamituṃ sato.
anya-e1010n:653: Kīdisaṃ maṃ tuvaṃ maññi, ahaṃ sabba jegucchako;
anya-e1010n:660: Santo pakkassa saṃsāro, nanto navassa rāgino.
anya-e1010n:665: Anto gocarikā pakkā, bahi gocarikā navā;
anya-e1010n:666: Pakkā nāsāya uccā te, nīcāyeva navā sino.
anya-e1010n:671: Sakkā sakkā na dassetuṃ, subhaṃsubhaṃ sataṃsataṃ;
anya-e1010n:674: Sakkā sakkāpi taṃ kātuṃ, subhaṃsubhaṃ na dhīmayaṃ;
anya-e1010n:678: Tapaṃ nibbāyituṃ icchaṃ, dukāyaṃ duti cintaye.
anya-e1010n:681: Andho ummattakovā so, nattānaṃ maññate tathā.
anya-e1010n:689: Abhiṇha gāhinaṃ rāga, yakkhaṃ ananta dukkha daṃ;
anya-e1010n:690: Asubhā tula mantena, vārehi taṃ sa bhāyati.
anya-e1010n:693: Rāgampi kusalaṃ maññi, jano teneva vañcito.
anya-e1010n:695: Āturaṃ asuciṃ putiṃ, passa nande samussayaṃ;
anya-e1010n:698: Subhato naṃ maññati bālo, avijjāya purakkhato;
anya-e1010n:701: Nhāruṭṭhi taca maṃsāni, saraṃ sataṃ na nindito;
anya-e1010n:711: Yathā tasseva paṇṇādiṃ, khādetvā visa mujjahe.
anya-e1010n:713: Evaṃ rāgo samuppajje, kāye gandhādi vāsite;
anya-e1010n:714: Anto tasseva jegucchaṃ, cintetvā rāga mujjahe.
anya-e1010n:720: Bījā bhāve kuto maggo, maggabījā hi bhāvanā.
anya-e1010n:740: Gehe rogā putī pāpā, vasanti kucchitā sadā.
anya-e1010n:743: Tāpaṃ jiraṃ dahaṃ pakkaṃ, caturaggi chavāyukā.
anya-e1010n:750: Yathā bahi tathā ajjhattaṃ, dhātū bhvāpā nalānilā;
anya-e1010n:754: Mettā bhāvana micchampi, suṇa buddhavaco yidaṃ;
anya-e1010n:758: Yeca taṃ upanayhanti, veraṃ tesaṃ nasammati.
anya-e1010n:767: Yeca tattha vijānanti, tato sammanti medhagā.
anya-e1010n:769: Kuddho atthaṃ najānāti, kuddho dhammaṃ napassati;
anya-e1010n:773: Paraṃ saṃkuppitaṃ ñatvā, yo sato upasammati.
anya-e1010n:775: Tasseva tena pāpiyyo, yo kuddhaṃ paṭikujjhati;
anya-e1010n:783: Akodhena jine kodhaṃ, asādhuṃ sādhunā jine;
anya-e1010n:786: Yo ve uppatitaṃ kodhaṃ, rathaṃ bhantaṃva vāraye;
anya-e1010n:787: Ta mahaṃ sārathī brūmi, rasmiggāho itarojano.
anya-e1010n:789: Purisassa hi jātassa, kudhārī jāyate mukhe;
anya-e1010n:798: Naparo paraṃ nikuppetha, nātimaññetha katthaci nakiñci;
anya-e1010n:811: Saccaṃ bhaṇe nakujjheyya, dajjā appampi yācito;
anya-e1010n:812: Etehi tīhi ṭhānehi, gacche devāna santike.
anya-e1010n:814: Na paresaṃ vilomāni, na paresaṃ katākataṃ;
anya-e1010n:817: Su dasaṃ vajjamaññesaṃ, attano pana duddasaṃ;
anya-e1010n:818: Paresañhi so vajjāni, ophunāti yathā bhusaṃ;
anya-e1010n:819: Attano pana chādeti, kaliṃva kitavā saṭṭho.
anya-e1010n:834: Hane dosū panāhāni, anattha kārakāni hi;
anya-e1010n:837: Sataṃ dujjana vākyehi, namano yāti vikriyaṃ;
anya-e1010n:869: Santaṃ hi sīlavaṃ dhītiṃ, hirottappena bhāyati;
anya-e1010n:885: Māññe maññantu taṃ disvā, cirappabba jito nuti.
anya-e1010n:891: Na tva tabbisaye nāme, dukkhaṃ mākari cetasi.
anya-e1010n:902: Mahā nattha karaṃ dosaṃ, nibbāyatu sa cetasi.
anya-e1010n:905: Dhammapālo khami tātaṃ, kapindo kandaro pataṃ.
anya-e1010n:908: Nāthassa pāramiṃ khantiṃ, saraṃ dhīro titikkhatu.
anya-e1010n:913: Sāsane cira vāsāpi, mādisāva ime iti;
anya-e1010n:916: Dve usetīti doso so, saparaṃ dayhate dvayaṃ;
anya-e1010n:917: Pahātabbo sa sabbesu, parattha sattha micchatā.
anya-e1010n:922: Jeguccha kkosa nindāni, bālo gaṇhāti akkhamo;
anya-e1010n:928: Nadi kallola viciyo, tīraṃ patvā samantidha;
anya-e1010n:929: Sabbe uppatitā dosā, khantipatvā samanti te.
anya-e1010n:932: Bhave yyummattako sova, tādisaṃ vacanaṃ bhaṇaṃ.
anya-e1010n:935: Gāmamajjhe aḷakkova, tathā māhohi taṃ jaha.
anya-e1010n:946: Idha peccaca nīceyyo, naṃnayaṃ gaṇhi akkhamo.
anya-e1010n:960: Mettā toyena vāreyya, siyā nibbuti sabbadhi.
anya-e1010n:965: Guṇī guṇī nandindāya, pasaṃsāya guṇī guṇī;
anya-e1010n:968: Guṇaṃ nindāya nāsetuṃ, nasakkā koci kussako;
anya-e1010n:971: Dosabbhā mala sañchanno, mettācando na rocati;
anya-e1010n:974: Su sutta buddha supinā, dvepiyā gutti nākkamo;
anya-e1010n:975: Samādhi sumukhā muḷhā, brahmā tyekā dasa gguṇā.
anya-e1010n:977: Sītaṃ karotu mettāya, cakkhuṃ lābhetu paññāya;
anya-e1010n:981: Dhammaṃ desetu pattānaṃ, cando hohi gategate.
anya-e1010n:989: Nākāsi kalahaṃ silā, sadā kenaci niccalā;
anya-e1010n:995: Sabbe ahaṃva icchanti, sattā sukhanti ñātuna;
anya-e1010n:996: Bhāveyya kamato mettaṃ, piya majjhatta verike.
anya-e1010n:998: Sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno;
anya-e1010n:1006: Averā byāpajjā nīgho, sukhī cassaṃ ahaṃva me;
anya-e1010n:1012: Doso mettāya dūrāri, taṇhā āsanna verikā;
anya-e1010n:1013: Taṇhaṃ piyesu vāreyya, dosaṃ verīsu mettiko.
anya-e1010n:1033: Thī pū riyā nariyāca, devānarā nipātikā.
anya-e1010n:1035: Averā hontu byāpajjā, anīghāca sukhī ime;
anya-e1010n:1044: Catuddisā nudisā dho, uddhaṃ sattāca pāṇino;
anya-e1010n:1045: Bhūtāca puggalā atta, bhāvī sabbe thi pūrisā.
anya-e1010n:1048: Averā byāpajjā nīghā, sukhattāca bhavantu te.
anya-e1010n:1051: Dvādase te paricchijja, bhāveyya puggale budho.
anya-e1010n:1062: Dukkhite karuṇaṃ brūhe, muditaṃ sukhite jane;
anya-e1010n:1075: Na bhayaṭṭā na iṇaṭṭā, neva ājīva kāraṇā.
anya-e1010n:1086: Svāgatā vata tebhikkhū, pattā sambuddhaputta taṃ;
anya-e1010n:1087: Gihi bandhana pucchijja, sukhitā sāsane ratā.
anya-e1010n:1107: Iti vuttaṃ munindena, nussaraṃ ani vattito;
anya-e1010n:1152: Natthi sañcicca āpatti, lajīva so pavuccati.
anya-e1010n:1155: Dhura dvayaṃva kiccaṃ taṃ, nāññakiccehi hāpaye.
anya-e1010n:1160: Yathā thambhe nibandheyya, vacchaṃ damaṃ naro idha;
anya-e1010n:1173: Paññāyā nusayaṃ saṇhaṃ, kilesaṃ bhikkhu bhindati.
anya-e1010n:1178: Mahāpuññe ṭhitaṃ sīlaṃ, samādhi appanā gataṃ;
anya-e1010n:1179: Catumagga yutā paññā, etaṃ sikkhattayaṃ mataṃ.
anya-e1010n:1196: Khīraṃ pitvāva jīvanti, jātāpi idha puttakā;
anya-e1010n:1203: Dāyā missaggahaṃ nicchi, saddhamma garuko jino.
anya-e1010n:1205: Lakkha kappa catussaṅkhya, kālaṃ vicita niccitaṃ;
anya-e1010n:1211: Bhaddanta rāhulasseva, dāyaṃ nopi adā jino;
anya-e1010n:1223: Puttā hontāpi dāyesmiṃ, nirāsā tiva ninditā.
anya-e1010n:1235: Āmisesu hane āsaṃ, puttamaṃsu pamaṃ saraṃ.
anya-e1010n:1243: Sīle ṭhitova bhuñjeyya, māditta guḷakaṃ gili.
anya-e1010n:1268: Daharāpi hi miyyanti, natthi vassaggato mataṃ.
anya-e1010n:1273: Etehi caturakkhehi, ganthaṃ sikkheyya saṃ vuto;
anya-e1010n:1292: Tiracchā peta laddhabbe, nāsaṃ kāmasukhe kare;
anya-e1010n:1293: Bhāyitabba sukhaṃ tañhi, tasmiṃ laggā mahātapā.
anya-e1010n:1305: Pariccattaṃ na hiṃ santi, muttaṃ vaṇṇenti sādhavo.
anya-e1010n:1314: Kataṃkataṃ mudhāto na, tadatthaṃ duccare care.
anya-e1010n:1326: Pāpaṃ mākara kāyatthaṃ, kāyo verī vasānugo;
anya-e1010n:1327: Bhūmyaṃ sessati vekārī, pāpiko nirayaṃ gato.
anya-e1010n:1345: Sabhāva malinaṃ kāyaṃ, nimmalāya kathaṃ kare;
anya-e1010n:1352: Cittaṃ vā laṅkataṃ sobhaṃ, sīlādi gandhavāsitaṃ.
anya-e1010n:1354: Sace bhāyatha dukkhassa, sace vo dukkha mappiyaṃ;
anya-e1010n:1355: Mākattha pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, āvivā yadivā raho.
anya-e1010n:1396: Rāgaṃ chindāti buddhāṇaṃ, saraṃ bhikkhu rahogato;
anya-e1010n:1412: Ihāpi dukkhitā hutvā, te pecca atidukkhino.
anya-e1010n:1440: Tasseva phāsu bhavati, ekassa vasato vane.
anya-e1010n:1443: Pavivekaṃ dukkhaṃ seyyo, yañce kāmamayaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e1010n:1478: Khandhāva honti bhijjanti, añño koci nalabbhati.
anya-e1010n:1503: Natumhaṃ bhikkhave rūpaṃ, taṃ jahethāti vuttato;
anya-e1010n:1506: Puttā matthi dhanā matthi, iti bālo vihaññati;
anya-e1010n:1510: Saññaṃ nāseyya khandhāva, atthīti ābhuje budho.
anya-e1010n:1512: Khandhanāsa manābhujja, mato me puttako iti;
anya-e1010n:1528: Natthi santesu laggantā, rūpakkhandhā dike svidha.
anya-e1010n:1530: Taṇhā gijjhati metanti, māno ahanti maññati;
anya-e1010n:1531: Diṭṭhi gaṇhāti attāti, ete papañcakā tayo.
anya-e1010n:1533: Mame ta maha mattāti, papañcānaṃ vasānugo;
anya-e1010n:1536: Name nāhaṃ naattāti, etehi vivadaṃ kare;
anya-e1010n:1540: Tatheva sabbadā maññe, mā papañca vasānugo.
anya-e1010n:1553: Anattāti girā saccā, attāti vacanaṃ musā;
anya-e1010n:1554: Musāya vivade loko, buddhena sacca vādinā.
anya-e1010n:1568: Sīse pilandiyā modī, sambuddha caraṇa mbujaṃ;
anya-e1010n:1584: Ta dākārena vattanti, avijjo ttharitā bhusaṃ.
anya-e1010n:1599: Taṇhā tassi mametanti, māno maññi ahantica;
anya-e1010n:1600: Yassi diṭṭhica attāti, papañcā nāmime tayo.
anya-e1010n:1603: Bhavayante payojentā, mokkhaṃ nādaṃsu te ciraṃ.
anya-e1010n:1606: Cirassaṃ dukkhitā honti, ārā nibbānato tiva.
anya-e1010n:1608: Name nāhaṃ naattāti, etehi vivadaṃ kare;
anya-e1010n:1620: Tasmā ettha tacovāha, sambuddho na bahicchaviṃ.
anya-e1010n:1626: Ñāṇena chindi tabbāca, tasmā chavīti vuccati.
anya-e1010n:1650: Mukha nāsakkhi kaṇṇādi, chiddā vachidda duddasaṃ.
anya-e1010n:1653: Pittaṃ semhañca papphāsaṃ, hadayaṃ yakanampi dhī.
anya-e1010n:1655: Anna pānaṃ manuññampi, kheḷa tinta madhopari;
anya-e1010n:1661: Etaṃ udariyaṃ nāma, tamhā pakkāsayaṃ gataṃ;
anya-e1010n:1662: Dinaccaye karīsantaṃ, sā sayaṃ taṃdvayampi dhī.
anya-e1010n:1665: Paṭicchanno niharati, tameva nto ṭhitaṃ jano.
anya-e1010n:1693: Santaṃ cinteyya nāsantaṃ, santaṃ cintayato sukhaṃ;
anya-e1010n:1748: Kicca mañña mupekkhāya, saṃsāra bhaya bhīruko.
anya-e1010n:1754: Akiccaṃ te nasevanti, kicce sātata kārino;
anya-e1010n:1768: Saṃmuḷhāte na muccanti, bhavā buddha virodhino.
anya-e1010n:1774: Alaṃ kāyavisodhena, bālova taṃ garuṃ karo.
anya-e1010n:1797: Rattaṃ pātuṃ chaviṃ chetvā, sakkā ḍaṃsādayopinaṃ;
anya-e1010n:1798: Chetvā maṃsa ṭṭhikādīni, dhīro nālambituṃ kathaṃ.
anya-e1010n:1800: Lagganti chavimatte ye, makkhikā sedapā yathā;
anya-e1010n:1801: Thīpuṃ mukhādi saññāya, te pamuḷhā mahātapā.
anya-e1010n:1814: Kāyā subhaṃ vipassantu, dibba kkhināpya passiyaṃ;
anya-e1010n:1839: Bahīva sodhitaṃ yassa, na vanto jeguccha puñjakaṃ;
anya-e1010n:1849: Sobhaṃ sobhaṃ naye ṭhānaṃ, manaṃ manaṃ pyalaṃ kataṃ.
anya-e1010n:1867: Addhā pītimano hoti, macco laddhā yadicchati.
anya-e1010n:1882: Te pahāya tare oghaṃ, nāvaṃ sitvāva pāragū.
anya-e1010n:1891: Taṃve pasahati māro, vāto rukkhaṃva dubbalaṃ.
anya-e1010n:1895: Taṃve nappasahati māro, vāto selaṃva pabbataṃ.
anya-e1010n:1897: Yathā agāraṃ ducchannaṃ, vuṭṭhi samati vijjhati;
anya-e1010n:1901: Patiṭṭhaṃ sāsane laddhā, nukkaṇṭhā nalasā ratā.
anya-e1010n:1916: Taṇhā saddhāna miccevaṃ, visesaṃ jāna tatvato;
anya-e1010n:1925: Kadācipi na duggandhi, sukkhaṃ cuṇṇampi candanaṃ;
anya-e1010n:1932: Iti ñatvāva sappañño, neva kkoseyya kiñcanaṃ.
anya-e1010n:1947: Sodhe citta mupakkamma, suddhaṃ upakkamena taṃ;
anya-e1010n:1948: Vahe sukhaṃ asaṅkheyyaṃ, dukkhaṃ asodhitaṃ mali.
anya-e1010n:1951: Cittaṃ sodhetu mālimpe, rāgadosa malehi taṃ.
